title: Mushroom

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The upper text explains the mechanic.

desc:
Post 2397
- __Tag: Mario Kart__: This card cannot be played and has its passives disabled unless if this is the most recent-drawn Mario Kart item card.

- Can also be played (and out of turn order) if you are the target of a Blue Shell.
- Playing this card rushes you towards the finish line, moving you in front of the next person in the turn order and negates the effects of a Blue Shell (223) recently played on you.
